title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - Dec 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for December 2019. All supported Pixel devices running Android 10 will receive these software updates as part of the December 2019 OTA, which begins rolling out to some users today.* We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

*Pixel 4 (XL) will start receiving the update next week 


Overview : 

Build Number: 
Pixel 2 (XL) & Pixel 3 (XL): QQ1A.191205.008
Pixel 3a (XL): QQ1A.191205.011
Pixel 4 (XL): 
T-Mobile, Fi, EMEA: QQ1B.191205.011
Japan & Taiwan: QQ1C.191205.016.A1
All other carriers: QQ1B.191205.012.A1

Notable fixes: 


12/3/19 Edit Note: 
*Updated Google Pay fix to better describe actual fix.  This is an experimental feature that may roll out in a future update.


In addition to the specific items listed above, the December update includes hundreds of various fixes and improvements across many areas including performance, stability, camera, display and face unlock.

Security fix details for this release can be found in the Android Security Bulletin : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
